item.title: Are the New England Patriots a Better Passing Team with Tom Brady or Cam Newton?
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.5 ✓ dplyr 1.0.4 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.4.0 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(waffle) library(ggrepel) library(dplyr) library(readr) Upload all the libraries needed BradyData <- read_csv("~/Desktop/data/Brady Data .csv") ## Warning: Duplicated column names deduplicated: 'Lg' => 'Lg_1' [17] ## ## ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ## cols( ## .
